name: Shuuchaku Gakuen
storyline:

I want to play with you for years to come. I want to play with you for years to come...”

I won't let you go.”

I have heard these words somewhere before. Words that someone had said to me a long time ago.

A mysterious academy deep in the mountains, far from the city.

The only thing that is measured there is whether or not a person possesses the qualities of morbid love.

As you spend your time at the school, your peaceful life will change into a blood-soaked day of corpses and rivers of blood...

The game is a visual novel in the form of a visual novel.

This is a visual novel style game.

The estimated playing time is about 5 hours.

The characters are all paranoid fanatics.
summary: The only quality that can be measured is whether or not they possess the qualities of morbid love. As they spend their time at the school, what was once a peaceful life turns into a blood-soaked, corpse-riddled, blood-soaked day....
